info.name: Google Darkest Fusion 1/2 [see userstyles.world]
info.description: SITE WILL BE UPDATED ON USERSTYLES.WORLD USERSTYLES.ORG DOES NOT WORK CORRECTLY, THERE IS NO CONTACT WITH ADMINS. ALSO IT HAS PRIVACY ISSUES, SEE: https://github.com/uso-archive/data/issues/50#issuecomment-1800944386 Do you like my style? Please support my work and fund coffee on PayPal > here < Thank you for being awesome! If you have issues with installing style, try backup site >here < Darkest Fusion supports almost every Google site. Due to style size limit it had been divided into 2 parts. This is for most common: Second style is > here <
info.additionalInfo: If you find issue, describe it accurate please. Provide screen, tell me language/area and browser you are using because often it depends of them. See example. Thanks! Known issues: * Custom logo doesn't work - it's userstyles.org issue. I tried to fix it but I can't. One time it worked when I deleted and installed again style. Maybe try it too, * Sometimes there are issues with downloading files from Drive. It's not style fault but Google/Stylus/Stylish. If you encounter that issue disable temporary style. More info here, * on Chrome/Opera Homepage may not work correctly, solution there, * Images in e-mails on Gmail have a bit different color, it's result of "workaround" to make most of e-mails dark themed (you should also enable official dark theme for Gmail). Changelog: * 8.11 - 14.11.2023 - fixes to Calendar, Contacts, Drive, Maps, Search, last update on userstyles.org, style 1/2 merged with 2/2 and will be updated on userstyles.world * 8.10 - 01.11.2023 - fixes to Drive, Maps, My Account, Search and Translate, workaround fix for Google issue that buttons to change category during searching not visible (noticed in Chrome/Firefox) * 8.09 - 27.10.2023 - fixes to My Account, Search and overall login fixes, * 8.08 - 09.10.2023 - fixes to Contacts, Drive, Images, Gmail (full/without dark e-mails), Maps, My Account, One, Photos, Search, Translate and overall login fixes, * 8.07 - 14.09.2023 - fixes to Drive, Maps, One, Search and Translate, * 8.06 - 24.08.2023 - fixes to Drive, Images, Gmail and Search, * 8.05 - 12.08.2023 - fixes to Drive, Maps, Search and overall fixes with login, * 8.04 - 03.08.2023 - fixes to Finance, Maps, My Account, Search, Translate and some global fixes, * 8.03 - 27.07.2023 - fixes to Images, Translate and some regex fixes, * 8.02 - 25.07.2023 - fixes to Drive, Gmail, Images, Maps, My Account, News, One, Search, Trends and others, also removed "Sticky navbar" for Images/Search because it was not working anymore for weeks and I am unable to restore it in the same way, instead I made permanent sticky (without changing size and position as it is by default) in a bit another way :), * 8.01 - 13.07.2023 - fixes to Books, Contacts, Drive, Gmail, Maps, Images and Search (phew!), * 8.00 - 09.07.2023 - Drive, Maps and Search fixes, * 7.99 - 03.07.2023 - fixes to Maps and Search, * 7.98 - 01.07.2023 - fixes to Maps, Search and Translate, * 7.97 - 28.06.2023 - fixes to Accounts, Images (+ some graphics enhancements there because probably a brick felt on the head of Google's frontend guy and they replaced him with monkey), Finances, Maps, Search and overall with google products, * 7.96 - fixes to Images (again google, srsly?!), Maps, Search and Translate, * 7.92 - 07.06.2023 - fixes to Contacts, Search, Translate and overall with menu login, * 7.91 - 04.06.2023 - again the sames fixes to Images because idiots from Google keeps changing everything under the hood for no reason -.-, * 7.90 -
